newsArray.title: Who Is G Kamailini? Know All About 17-Year-Old Debutant of India Women's Cricket Team Who Replaced Smriti Mandhana in Playing XI During IND-W vs SL-W 5th T20I 2025
newsArray.description: India has already secured an unassailable 4-0 lead in the series, providing the selectors with the leeway to experiment with the playing XI. The inclusion and trial of promising young talent like Kamalini and Vaishnavi Sharma is part of a strategic vision by Head Coach Amol Muzumdar to build a robust and versatile squad capable of challenging for the World Cup title.

newsArray.title: On this day: Retirement that stunned Indian cricket - How MS Dhoni's Test career ended
newsArray.description: Without any ceremony, 44 minutes after MS Dhoni finished his post-match press conference following the Boxing Day Test at the Melbourne Cricket Ground, the BCCI sent out a press release. The news came an hour after India had managed to draw an away Test — the first time in the previous 14 Australia-India Tests that the visiting team had not lost.

newsArray.title: Vijay Hazare Trophy 2025: Virat Kohli To Play One More Match For Delhi Ahead Of IND Vs New Zealand ODI Series 2026
newsArray.description: Former Team India captain and star batter Virat Kohli will play another game for his Delhi team in the Vijay Hazare Trophy 2025 tournament ahead of the upcoming India vs New Zealand ODI Series 2026. Delhi will be playing against the Railways on January 6, 2026 in Bengaluru and Virat Kohli will be in the squad, DDCA President Rohan Jaitley told PTI.
